siberian_river_route_provinces = { #Roughly follows the Siberian River Routes, provinces that are dubious are commented with explanations
	#Cherdyn or Babinov path brings the route to Ostyaki
	#Down the Irtysh
	1076 1075 1074 4691
	#Up the Ob
	1069 2429 1068 1064
	#Ket -> Portage to the Yenesei (Not actually a province here since they are so big the rivers actually touch province wise)
	#Yenesei
	2430 #Troitsky (I think this province is actually Turukhan)
	1067 #Turukhan (Allows a portage between here and Ket that didn't actually exist, but Turukhansk was an important settlement so it needs to be included here)
	2432 
	2443 #Krasnoyarsk (Southern limit on the Yenesei historically)
	#Taz -> Portage to Turukhan
	2445
	#Northern route to Yakutsk & the Lena
	2431 2436 2437 1045
	#Up the Angara -> Portage to the Lena
	1062
	#Down the Lena
	2442 1054 2435 1051 1046 2438
	#Over the Mountains to the Pacific
	1043
	#Penetrating the Amur
	1060 1057 4220 1058 2446 2102 4662
	#Does not go further into the Amur Region, that works differently
	#Kolyma->Pacific
	1036 1037 2440
}
